name: URL Uploader by CP
description: Telegram's Open Source URL Uploader Bot. Create your Fork now.

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token from @botfather, as a string.

SCREENSHOTS.description: Generate screenshots for file after uploading ( True or false )

AUTH_USERS.description: allow only pre-defined users to use this bot Enter Your User id

DEF_THUMB_NAIL_VID_S.description: default thumbnail link to be used in the videos if youtube-dl is unable to find a thumbnail. Get a link for your image from @TGraphHEXbot

HTTP_PROXY.description: proxy for accessing youtube-dl in GeoRestricted Areas. Get your own proxy from https://github.com/rg3/youtube-dl/issues/1091#issuecomment-230163061
